references.paper_title: Enhancing presentation slide generation by LLMs with a multi-staged end-to-end approach
references.reason: This paper proposes a multi-staged end-to-end approach for presentation slide generation using LLMs, which is a key comparative method in the current work.
This paper introduces a knowledge-centric approach to document visualization and summarization, which is relevant to the task of presentation generation.

references.paper_title: MLLM-as-a-judge: Assessing multimodal LLM-as-a-judge with vision-language benchmark
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel evaluation framework, MLLM-as-a-judge, for assessing the quality of multimodal LLM outputs, which is highly relevant to the evaluation methodology in the current work.

references.paper_title: Doc2ppt: Automatic presentation slides generation from scientific documents
references.reason: This paper presents Doc2ppt, an automatic presentation slide generation method that is compared with the proposed method in the current study.

references.paper_title: Pptc benchmark: Evaluating large language models for powerpoint task completion
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset and evaluation metrics for assessing the capabilities of LLMs in generating presentations, which is closely related to the evaluation methodology in this paper.
